fields.text: Welcome to BlueCrew, the San Francisco-based staffing platform that connects you to job opportunities straight from your phone.
If you are a worker looking for shifts, press '[INDEX]'.
To create or update your profile and start receiving shift offers, press '[INDEX]'.
Please hold while we connect you to our team to assist with your profile setup.
To speak with a support specialist about your account, press '[INDEX]'.
Please hold while we connect you to a support specialist.
If you are an employer in need of staff, press '[INDEX]'.
To post a new job or shift, press '[INDEX]'.
Please hold while we connect you to our employer services team to post your job.
To speak with our sales team about staffing solutions, press '[INDEX]'.
Please hold while we connect you with a sales representative.
